CoordDf¶

class mapdeduce.CoordDf(df)¶
paired_distances(other)¶

Compute euclidean distances between points in self.df and paired points in another dataframe. The other dataframe must have the same dimensions as self.df

Args:

other (pd.DataFrame)

Returns:

(ndarray): Euclidean distances.

pca_rotate(inplace=True)¶

Rotate coordinates along first and second principal components.

Args:
inplace (bool): Rotate the data inplace, or return a rotated

copy of the data.

points_in_patch(patch)¶

Points in sel.df contained in a matplotlib patch.

Args:

patch (matplotlib.patches.Patch)

Returns:

Strains in patch.

Transform features using quantile information.

Notes:

preprocessing.quantile_transform

Args:

rotate(a, inplace=True)¶

Rotate points a degrees around the origin anticlockwise.

Args:

a (Number): Arc degrees to rotate the dataframe by. inplace (bool): Rotate the data inplace, or return a rotated

copy of the data.
